good morning! my FRC team, is heaving problems to install one limelight 3g in our swerve kit. We have the code for use, but i don’t know how to use the limelight code with main code. someone can help me? sorry by my english, i’m brazillian

If I understand correctly you want to do localization. There is a tutorial in the Limelight docs that shows you how to do this. There is also a sample codebase. It would be best to take a look at those.

docs.limelightvision.io

Localization with MegaTag | Limelight Documentation

1. Ensure a field map is uploaded to your Limelight.

github.com

limelight-examples/java-wpilib/swerve-megatag-odometry at main ·...
